member.summary: Describes the position of an item that is managed by .

member.name: M:Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of with the specified index and offset.
member.param: An index that is relative to the generated (realized) items. -1 is a special value that refers to a fictitious item at the beginning or the end of the items list.

An offset that is relative to the ungenerated (unrealized) items near the indexed item. An offset of 0 refers to the indexed element itself, an offset of 1 refers to the next ungenerated (unrealized) item, and an offset of -1 refers to the previous item.
